alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 19 at 3:01AM EST until January 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM EST FRIDAY FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter of a mile or less in dense fog. For the Lake Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots expected. * WHERE...Inland Berkeley County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 7 AM EST this morning. For the Lake Wind Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 6 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
